name: Gun Done: COLOR PARADE
description:
Gun Done - it's a game about brave cowboys, which fight against each other under the scorching sun and cold rain. You know these heroes, do you? And there's a beautiful locations, weather effects, excellent sound. Many game modes and you can play any of them, different cowboys to play too! Gun Done - this is a game that is not ashamed to gift to a friend! Enjoy, friend! :]

-Play alone or with friend on the same device;
-Many heroes to play;
-Lots of guns to unlock;
-Various duel types;
-Bonuses and achievements;
-Gradually increasing difficulty;
